SGCell.newAgentHere.description: Create a new Agent from the associated agent type.

SGCell.deleteAllAgents.description: Delete all agents in this cell

SGCell.getId.description: Get cell identifier using numeric ID consistent with cellIdFromCoords

SGCell.getAgents.description: Get all agents in this cell.

SGCell.getFirstAgentOfSpecie.description: Get the first agent of a specific type in this cell.

SGCell.getNeighborCells.description: Get the neighboring cells of the current cell.

SGCell.getNeighborCells_inRadius.description: Get all neighbor cells within a given radius according to the grid's neighborhood type.

SGCell.getClosestNeighborMatching.description: Get the closest cell within a given radius that matches all given conditions.

SGCell.getClosestAgentMatching.description: Find the closest neighboring cell within a given radius that contains at least one agent

SGCell.nbAgents.description: Get the number of agents in this cell.

SGCell.distanceTo.description: Compute Euclidean distance to another cell.

SGCell.hasAgent.description: Check if this cell contains a specific agent

SGCell.hasAgents.description: Check if this cell contains agents of a specific type.

SGCell.isEmpty.description: Check if this cell is empty of agents of a specific type.

SGEntityType.setDefaultValue.description: Set a default value for a specific attribute.

SGEntityType.setDefaultValues.description: Set default values for multiple attributes.

SGEntityType.setDefaultValues_randomChoi.description: Set default values with automatic random choice conversion for lists/tuples.

SGEntityType.setDefaultValues_randomNume.description: Set default numeric values with automatic random distribution conversion.

SGEntityType.setEntities.description: Set the value of attribut value of all entities

SGEntityType.setTooltip.description: Set a custom tooltip option for entities of this definition.

SGEntityType.setRandomEntity.description: Apply a value to a random entity

SGEntityType.setRandomEntity_withValue.description: To apply a value to a random entity with a certain value

SGEntityType.setRandomEntity_withValueNo.description: To apply a value to a random entity not having a certain value

SGEntityType.setRandomEntities.description: Applies the same attribut value for a random number of entities

SGEntityType.setRandomEntities_withValue.description: To apply a value to some random entities with a certain value
To apply a value to some random entities noty having a certain value

SGEntityType.setEntities_withColumn.description: Set the value of attribut to all entities in a specified column

SGEntityType.setEntities_withRow.description: Set the value of attribut to all entities in a specified row

SGEntityType.copyValue_forAllEntities.description: Copy the value of an attribut (source_att) in another attribute (target_att), for all the entities compliant with the condition.

SGEntityType.metricOnEntitiesWithValue.description: Get metrics for entities that have a specific attribute value.

SGEntityType.metricOnEntitiesWithValueNo.description: Get metrics for entities that do not have a specific attribute value.

SGEntityType.newPov.description: Declare a new Point of View for the entityType.

SGEntityType.newBorderPov.description: Declare a new Point of View (only for border color).

SGEntityType.newBorderPovColorAndWidth.description: Declare a new Point of View (only for border color).

SGEntityType.newModelAction.description: Create an SGModelAction_OnEntities targeting entities of this definition.

SGEntityType.getEntity.description: Return an entity identified by its id or its coordinates on a grid

SGEntityType.getEntities.description: Get all entities, optionally filtered by a condition.

SGEntityType.getEntities_withValue.description: Get all entities that have a specific attribute value.

SGEntityType.getEntities_withValueNot.description: Get all entities that do not have a specific attribute value.

SGEntityType.getRandomEntity.description: Return a random entity from the available entities.

SGEntityType.getRandomEntity_withValue.description: Return a random entity that has a specific attribute value.

SGEntityType.getRandomEntity_withValueNo.description: Return a random entity that does not have a specific attribute value.

SGEntityType.getRandomEntities.description: Return a specified number of random entities.

SGEntityType.getRandomEntities_withValue.description: Return a specified number of random entities that have a specific attribute value.
Return a specified number of random entities that do not have a specific attribute value.

SGEntityType.nbOfEntities.description: Get the total number of entities in this definition.

SGEntityType.nb_withValue.description: Get the number of entities that have a specific attribute value.

SGEntityType.deleteAllEntities.description: Delete all entities of the entity type.

SGEntityType.displayPov.description: Displays the symbology for the specified Point of View.

SGEntityType.displayBorderPov.description: Displays the border symbology for the specified Point of View.

SGEntityType.displayAttributeValueInCont.description: Set an attribute to be displayed in the contextual menu.

SGEntityType.displayTooltip.description: Method to control the display of entity tooltips

SGCellType.setLayoutOrder.description: Set the layoutOrder for the grid (gameSpace) of this cellDef in Enhanced Grid Layout.

SGCellType.getCell.description: Retrieve a cell object from the grid.

SGCellType.getEntity.description: Get a single entity (cell) by coordinates.

SGCellType.getEntities_withRow.description: Get all entities (cells) in a specific row.

SGCellType.getEntities_withColumn.description: Get all entities (cells) in a specific column.

SGCellType.getRandomEntity.description: Return a random cell from this grid.

SGAgentType.newAgentOnCell.description: Create a new agent on a specific cell.

SGAgentType.newAgentsOnCell.description: Create a specific number of new Agents of a given type on a specific cell.

SGAgentType.newAgentAtCoords.description: Create a new Agent of a given type.

SGAgentType.newAgentsAtCoords.description: Create a specific number of new Agents of a given type.

SGAgentType.newAgentAtRandom.description: Create a new Agent of a given type and place it on a random cell.

SGAgentType.newAgentsAtRandom.description: Create a number of Agents of a given type and place them on random cells.

SGAgentType.getRandomEntity.description: Return a random agent of this type.

SGAgentType.moveRandomly.description: All agents of this type move randomly.
